sentences.sentence: The groundswell forced Arroyo to suspend the contracts in September.
sentences.translation: 这一风波迫使阿罗约在9月份暂停了这些合同。

sentences.sentence: The groundswell forced Arroyo to suspend the contracts in September.
sentences.translation: 这一风波迫使阿罗约在9月份暂停了这些合同。

sentences.sentence: Frank Arroyo said that his rental business has decreased by 90% since Citi Bike was rolled out last month.
sentences.translation: 弗兰克·阿罗约说，自从上个月花旗集团推出自行车以来，他的租赁业务已经减少了90%。
